content.text:
<think>
Opening scene for Aric, Level 1 Fighter, curious scholar in a library setting. Character creation complete, need to kick off the adventure with immersive narrative, session header, planning block. No combat, no dice needed. Set up world time, location, and hooks.
</think>

<final>
```json
{
  "session_header": "[SESSION_HEADER]\nTimestamp: 1492 DR, Mirtul 3, 09:15:00\nLocation: The Athenaeum of Whispered Pages\nStatus: Lvl 1 Fighter | HP: 12/12 | XP: 0/300 | Gold: 10gp",
  "resources": "HD: 1/1 | No Spells Yet (Level 2+) | Second Wind: 1/1 | Potions: 0 | Exhaustion: 0",
  "narrative": "Morning (09:15:00) in the Athenaeum of Whispered Pages—pale sunlight filters through stained-glass windows set high in the vaulted ceiling, casting fractured rainbows across towering shelves of cracked leather and aged vellum. The air tastes of dust and candle wax and something older, something that clings to the back of the throat like a half-remembered dream.\n\nAric (Lvl 1) sits at a scarred oak reading table near the eastern alcove, surrounded by a fortress of open books. His fingers trace the faded ink of a genealogical treatise—the seventh such volume he's consulted this week—searching for references to a name that keeps appearing in the margins of unrelated texts: *Valdros Ashenmoor*. A cartographer. A heretic. A man who, three centuries ago, claimed to have mapped a place that shouldn't exist.\n\nThe library is nearly empty at this hour. A few robed acolytes drift between the shelves like sleepwalkers, and somewhere deeper in the stacks, the head librarian—an elderly woman named Tessara Quill (Lvl 3)—can be heard muttering to herself as she catalogs new acquisitions. The rhythmic scratch of her quill is the only constant sound.\n\nThen something catches Aric's eye. Pressed between the pages of the genealogy, thin as a whisper: a folded slip of parchment that doesn't belong. The paper is newer than the book by at least two hundred years, and someone has written on it in a hurried, slanted hand:\n\n*\"The Ashenmoor Index is real. Sub-level 4. Behind the Meridian Door. Do not let Tessara see you.\"*\n\nThe ink is still faintly damp.\n\nAric's pulse quickens. He glances toward the sound of Tessara's (Lvl 3) quill, then back at the note. Sub-level 4—he didn't even know the Athenaeum had a fourth sub-level. The deepest he's ever been granted access to is the second, and that required a formal petition signed by three senior scholars.\n\nSomeone left this note for him. Recently. Perhaps minutes ago.",
  "planning_block": {
    "thinking": "This is intriguing and potentially dangerous. Someone knows I've been researching Valdros Ashenmoor and has deliberately planted a note in the exact book I'm reading. That means I'm being watched—or someone anticipated my research path. The note warns against Tessara, the head librarian, which suggests she's either guarding whatever's down there or is actively hiding it. Sub-level 4 is restricted territory I've never accessed. I need to decide whether to investigate immediately, gather more information first, or confront Tessara directly.",
    "context": "Opening scene - mysterious note discovered during research",
    "choices": {
      "investigate_sublevel": {
        "id": "investigate_sublevel",
        "text": "Seek Sub-Level 4",
        "description": "Pocket the note and search for a way down to Sub-level 4 while Tessara is occupied with her cataloging. The Meridian Door must be somewhere below.",
        "pros": ["Strike while the opportunity is fresh", "Tessara is distracted", "The ink is still damp—whoever left the note may still be nearby"],
        "cons": ["Trespassing in restricted areas could mean expulsion", "Could be a trap", "No idea what's behind that door"],
        "confidence": "medium",
        "risk_level": "high"
      },
      "research_ashenmoor": {
        "id": "research_ashenmoor",
        "text": "Research First",
        "description": "Before acting on the note, dig deeper into Valdros Ashenmoor and the Athenaeum's architectural history. Knowledge is armor.",
        "pros": ["Better prepared for what lies below", "Might reveal who left the note", "Safer approach"],
        "cons": ["The note-leaver may not wait", "Tessara could discover you've found it", "Delays action on time-sensitive clue"],
        "confidence": "high",
        "risk_level": "low"
      },
      "confront_tessara": {
        "id": "confront_tessara",
        "text": "Ask Tessara Directly",
        "description": "Approach the head librarian and ask about Valdros Ashenmoor, Sub-level 4, and the Meridian Door. Gauge her reaction carefully.",
        "pros": ["Tessara may share knowledge willingly", "Tests whether she's ally or obstacle", "Direct and honest approach"],
        "cons": ["The note explicitly warned against this", "She may confiscate your research", "Could alert whoever is watching"],
        "confidence": "low",
        "risk_level": "medium"
      },
      "scan_the_room": {
        "id": "scan_the_room",
        "text": "Look for the Note-Leaver",
        "description": "The ink is still damp. Whoever planted this note may be in the library right now. Casually survey the reading hall for anyone watching you.",
        "pros": ["Identify your mysterious contact", "Gain an ally or informant", "Low commitment—just observing"],
        "cons": ["They may have already left", "Drawing attention to yourself", "Delays acting on the clue"],
        "confidence": "medium",
        "risk_level": "safe"
      }
    }
  },
  "god_mode_response": "",
  "entities_mentioned": ["Aric", "Tessara Quill", "Valdros Ashenmoor"],
  "location_confirmed": "The Athenaeum of Whispered Pages",
  "state_updates": {
    "world_data": {
      "world_time": {
        "hour": 9,
        "minute": 15,
        "second": 0,
        "day": 3,
        "month": 5,
        "year": 1492,
        "time_of_day": "morning"
      },
      "current_location": "loc_athenaeum_001",
      "weather": "Clear, mild spring morning"
    },
    "npc_data": {
      "npc_tessara_001": {
        "entity_id": "npc_tessara_001",

        "display_name": "Tessara Quill",

        "level": 3,
        "class_name": "Scholar",

    },

        }
      ]
```
